idea:
Our Mission

Associate consultants are dedicated to using a progressive design and team oriented approach to provide structural engineering services in ethical manner that contribute to the success of our clients, employees and community


Our Vision

Associate consultants are committed to bringing the best structural design experience to our valued clients around the world through its innovative solution offerings.

We strive to extend our vast experience and positive reputation in structural engineering.

Through our professional expertise in structural engineering and design, we guide and support our clients so that you can make a difference in our world.

We work tirelessly to ensure that our projects are mutually successful for all and endeavour to forge relationships that stand the test of time.

We work for our clients to give innovative solution in the safer, faster, cleaner and more economically than ever before.
name: ASSOCIATED STRUCTURAL ENGINEERS LLP

idea:
Houm Technology Private Limited has developed an innovative internet product that helps consumers regain privacy and ownership on the internet. Houm.me is a disruptive and breakthrough product that empowers Users of the internet to become true Owners of the internet ‚Äì the only way for consumers to achieve digital online privacy.

Houm helps consumers to create a digital home with legal ownership on a place on the internet, where consumers can keep their digital assets. This digital home will be accessible to no other person, company, systems, software or app but only to the individual who owns that digital Houm. Inside that digital home, he or she can create an Inner Circle of people in absolute privacy and carryout Voice Calls, Instant Chat, Video Calls, Secure Storage and Sharing privately. Essentially, Inner Circle inside the digital home is a private communication channel where the respective owner is in full control.

Consumer can create a digital home in simple 3 steps within 3 minutes. It involves the consumer choosing a personal domain on the internet, hosting that domain in a private place on the internet and then consolidating all his/her digital assets inside that digital home that is truly private.
name: HOUM TECHNOLOGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Our innovation works as a special purpose vehicle that functions exactly like any retail fuel

station while also providing mobility. The RPP is outfitted with technology such as IoT, which

ensures all safety precautions when it comes to fuel dispensing and transportation.

As a result, we devised a petrol pump on wheels.

Our service is integrated with a smartphone mobile application that allows customers to order

fuel. This service saves consumers money on their fuel bills while also providing them with the

utmost convenience. This solution is extremely scalable because the mobile application serves

as a platform that can accommodate more consumers while also connecting them with the

service provider making it scalable,innovative and effective

idea:
BRICS GREEN PRIVATE LIMITED is the India‚Äôs  leading electric vehicle fast  charging  infrastructure  company  that  charges  the  sustainable future.  We  focus  on fastest  charging  infrastructure  and  technology  automation  for  electric  vehicle  industry.  We  provide  end  to  end  electric  charging  station  needs  with  high  standards,  Quality,  efficiency,   speed and  technology.


BRICS GREEN has an innovative business model. Our design for EV chargers, software, and technology is going to be far different compared to the rest of the competitors in the industry. 


We are going to improve the EV charging infrastructure industry, as this industry is nuclear and there is no proper supply chain in this industry. On the other hand, we have a proper chain of supply from manufacturer to final setup. Lots of improvement is needed in chargers like quality, efficiency, technology, automation, sustainability software systems, and their services, etc. We solve all of these problems and give improvements in this sector.
name: BRICS GREEN PRIVATE LIMITED
